about.title: About me
about.p-1: Hello! My name is Shavala Roman and I am a junior frontend developer. I'm passionate about the creative process of building great custom web applications.
about.p-2: My goal is to ensure high quality code and efficient application performance. I use best practices and development principles to ensure optimal page loading speeds, as well as scalability and reusability of components.
about.p-3: I have knowledge of Node.js, which allows me to develop the server side of applications and perform various server-side tasks. This gives me the opportunity to understand the full cycle of web application development and interaction with databases.
about.p-4: Beyond that, I am always open to learning new technologies and deepening my knowledge. I strive to constantly improve and apply new tools to create even cooler and more innovative projects.
about.p-5: If you're looking for a talented, responsible, and persistent developer, I'm ready to take on new challenges and collaborate with your team. Together, we can create amazing web applications that are engaging and leave a positive impression on users.
